Magmeld Delegation Leader Lada:
Magmeld was discovered long ago by Elven Elemental Masters.
It is a beautiful place filled with the amiable Cat people and Trees of Genesis.
But you need to be careful -- beautiful places can still be fraught with danger! Apparently, Magmeld has a dark secret deep within its depths.
Which is why they really need help over there! Do you want to go and see for yourself?
